gcci.text: H100 spot pricing at $3.11/hr signals constrained supply dynamics as cloud providers ration premium GPUs amid surging inference demand, while hyperscalers accelerate capex to reduce third-party dependencies.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek's aggressive $1.25/1M token pricing is forcing incumbents to compress margins as commoditization accelerates, with efficiency gains from distillation and architecture innovations driving the price floor lower.

gagl.text: AI infrastructure's 120 TWh annual consumption represents a 25% grid demand spike, necessitating accelerated nuclear adoption and carbon accounting as data centers approach 4% of total U.S. electricity usage.

aipi.text: Capital deployment in AI infrastructure has reached bubble-risk territory with $500B+ pledged capex outpacing revenue generation by 18 months, while enterprise adoption curves suggest sustainability challenges beyond 2026.
